title: Leblanc tips
body: How do you play leblanc. Whats the skill order, item, laning phase, mid game, late game.  etc..

replies.body:
In order, start q-w-e then max them in that order (sometimes you can start e to cheese or if you're
invading with a morg/thresh/blitz)

A lot of people rush gunblade but personally I prefer morellos for the mana and cdr (or I rush zhonyas vs Zed or Syndra) 

You've gotta be a huge bully level 1-6 in particular, harass all you can by using w in their face, auto them, go back to w and q them 

Mid game you should be fairly strong, try to get picks or kill off the squishy enemy rather than be an initiator or take down a tanky bruiser (hopefully that makes sense?)

Late game LeBlanc is pretty team reliant (as in she needs a competent team who didn't feed all game) she can't 1v9 like she used to, unless you're like gold+ elo smurfing in bronze lol

If you w in and miss your chain, it's usually a good idea to go back to safety unless you 110% know you can kill them without being killed

Add me if you want, it'll be easier to explain and I have 700k on lb :D

thank you! with these tips i was able to get 37% winrate on leblanc after getting elo boosted by someone playing kha'zix (im not a support main btw check my account) https://gyazo.com/69bb4ee94b32c68a7c8dccd3a196ad77
She's getting a rework soon being released around pre-season. May be worthwhile investing in her after that.
